Articles.Content: If you're like me and you have created a lot of crafts, looking at your craft list is a pain. I have a simple suggestion: Folders in the craft list. Basically you can add folders and put your crafts in them instead of having them cluttered in one pile. Lets hope this gets reality because I really want organization in my crafts

Here here, I will definitely second this request. I could use something of this sort in so many ways. I can already imagine a folder for SSTOs, gliders, cargo jets, etc.

Unfortunately I don't know of such a mod.

That be a great little mod. Having a long list of dozens of spacecrafts and spaceplans doesn't help you find what you're looking for at all...

Novel idea. I would also like to see a single unified database for where crafts and subs are stored. Then with folders the root would simply be the "corporation name" of that particular save and expand from there. So we could access designs across any save without having to go into the save directories and copy things around.
